{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZTE |model=ZXDSL 931WII |revision=V1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/17/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=dsl modem, wireless router |fcc_id=Q78-ZXDSL931WII |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6368U |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL032N90TFI04 |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M13S2561616A-5T |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4318 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+,VDSL2 |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|xDSL CPE}} {{ProductPage|http://wwwen.zte.com.cn/pub/en/products/access/cpe/201111/t20111110_262346.html}} ===Features=== *Providing 4x 10/100 Base-T Ethernet interface *Supporting Bridge and Router mode *High reliability, simple operation and low power consumption *ITU-T G.992.1/ G.992.3/ G.992.5 ADSL/ADSL2/ADS2+ *ITU-T G.993.2 VDSL2 standard This device have many good functions, such as 802,1q, L2 management switch :and VDSL2 support up to 100Mbit/s downstream to 60Mbit/s Upstream. :Device based on broadcom BCM6368 V3.1 chip. ===== Hardware Highlights ===== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! SoC ! Ram ! Flash ! Ethernet ! Wireless ! Modem ! USB ! Serial ! JTag |- | Broadcom
BCM6368U
@400MHz | 64 MiB | 4 MiB | 4 x 100 | Broadcom
BCM4318
802.11a/b/g | xDSL | No | Yes | ? |- |} *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/zte/zxdsl_931wii_v1 ''ZTE ZXDSL 931WII V1'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=34211 On '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[https://amazingdiy.wordpress.com/2011/06/06/zxdsl-931wii-hacking/ ''ZXDSL 931WII'' hacking on '''AmazingDIY'''] :How to connect to the Serial Port of this specific device. ===== Buttons ===== The ZTE ZXDSL 931WII has four buttons. They are Power ON/OFF,WPS,Reset and WLAN ON/OFF. ===== Photos ===== [http://www.pakitong.com/2013/03/tm-unifi-zte-zxdsl-931dii-vdsl-modem.html Photos ZXDSL 931WII] ==Images== Opening the case - Main PCB P1020850.JPG|Front P1020863.JPG|Back P1020851.JPG|Main SoC + RAM + Serial P1020853.JPG|Wireless SoC + WLAN RF FEM P1020865.JPG|Flash [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
